evidence.claim: eSaha utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless computing.
The platform adheres to HIPAA compliance for data handling.
eSaha implements FHIR APIs for healthcare data interoperability.
Data is stored in Amazon RDS to ensure reliability and performance.
Event-driven architecture is achieved using AWS SNS for integration.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of involvement with X12 transactions or healthcare clearinghouse functions.
